text:
="preserve">Ary Façanha de Sá (1 April 1928 – 16 August 2020) was a Brazilian long jumper. At the 1952 Summer Olympics he finished fourth in the long jump. He also competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics.
He became South American long jump champion in 1952, won silver medals in 1956 and 1958 and a bronze medal in 1954.
Sa died on 16 August 2020 at the age of 92.
